git_hooks documentation
=======================

Add your content using ``reStructuredText`` syntax. See the
`reStructuredText <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/index.html>`_
documentation for details.
.. note::
Git hooks are scripts that Git executes before or after certain operations,
such as committing or pushing code. These hooks help enforce coding standards,
run automated tests,
or perform any custom tasks required to maintain code quality.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
